title: Paladin Spell List
excerpt: The full list of spells available to the Paladin class.
markdown: # Paladin Spell List This section presents the Paladin spell list. The spells are organized by spell level and then alphabetized, and each spell's school of magic is listed. In the Special column, C means the spell requires Concentration, R means it's a Ritual, and M means it requires a specific Material component. ### Level 1 Paladin Spells | Spell | School | Special | |-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------|---------| | Bless | Enchantment | C, M | | Command | Enchantment | -
